translation.en: -[Cian] Hello. -Hi.
Wow, you look great.
I love this. [chuckles]
-[Cian] Shall we get started? -Yes.
Are you looking for love?
Uh, yes. Unquestionably so.
I don't want to be single forever, no. 'Cause I don't wanna feel lonely.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas être célibatairepour toujours, et me sentir seule.

translation.en: I haven't dated in 33 years.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas eu de rencard depuis 33 ans.

translation.en: It's… It's really hard.
To have a lovely lady,
oh my goodness,
I'm all for it.
[narrator] Finding love can be hard for anyone.
translation.fr: Tout le monde a du mal à trouver l'amour.

translation.en: Keep looking for that fish in your pond.
You're in competition with -all the other young men. -[groans]
translation.fr: Tu es en concurrence avec d'autres jeunes.

translation.en: [narrator] And for some people, it can feel like an impossible dream.
translation.fr: Et pour certains,ça semble un rêve impossible.

translation.en: Uh, let's change the topic. Can we change the topic?
You find your Prince Charming. I find my Cinderella. Bam!
translation.fr: À ton prince charmantet à ma Cendrillon. Bam !

translation.en: [narrator] This series follows people on the autism spectrum…
translation.fr: Cette série suit des adultes autistes…

translation.en: I dub thee Sir James.
Through this process, he might find love.
-Oh yeah. -[woman] Yeah.
[narrator] …as they navigate the confusing world of relationships…
translation.fr: … dans le dédale de l'univers hasardeuxdes relations…

translation.en: I really like how you hold my hand.
translation.fr: J'aime comme tu me tiens la main.

translation.en: [narrator] …and dating.
Do you wanna be my girlfriend?
-[Cian] Hello. -How's things going?
-[Cian] Good. How are you? -I'm doing fine. Thank you so much.
translation.fr: - Bien. Et toi ?- Je vais bien, merci beaucoup.

translation.en: -[Cian] So you're ready for this? -Um, you bet.
My name is Dani.
I am 26 years old.
You could say I have a mixture of six different nationalities.
translation.fr: Je suis un mélangede six nationalités différentes.

translation.en: So mostly Mexican, Caucasian, and a smidge of Asian.
translation.fr: Je suis mexicaine, caucasienneet j'ai un peu de sang asiatique.

translation.en: I am single, and I am on the autism spectrum.
translation.fr: Je suis célibataire et j'ai un TSA.

translation.en: -[Cian] Are you looking for love, Dani? -I am.
[sighs] Unfortunately, it's just so hard to find a boyfriend.
translation.fr: Malheureusement, c'est hyper durde trouver un petit ami.

translation.en: It's… [sighs]
You could imagine, I have to kiss many frogs to find the right guy.
translation.fr: Je dois embrasser beaucoup de crapaudspour trouver le bon mec.

translation.en: It's not just about the looks.
I'm looking for somebody who is motivated and has really great hygiene,
translation.fr: Je cherche quelqu'un de déterminéet avec une bonne hygiène,

translation.en: because I don't like bad breath.
translation.fr: car je n'aime pas la mauvaise haleine.

translation.en: [narrator] Dani lives in Los Angeles with her aunt and uncle.
translation.fr: Dani vit à Los Angelesavec sa tante et son oncle.

translation.en: -Serve you some coffee. -Thank you.
translation.fr: - Je te sers du café.- Merci.

translation.en: [narrator] She's lived with them since she was 11 years old.
translation.fr: Elle vit avec eux depuis l'âge de 11 ans.

translation.en: It's hard for me to find the right person who is so much like me.
translation.fr: C'est dur de trouver la bonne personneet qui me ressemble.

translation.en: -I've been desperate to look for love. -[aunt] Don't be desperate, Dani.
translation.fr: Je cherche désespérément l'amour. Ne désespère pas.

translation.en: I want somebody with a career who can win good bucks, good salaries.
translation.fr: Je veux quelqu'un avec un bon boulot,et qui gagne bien sa vie.

translation.en: I need somebody who's financially secure, who can maintain a company.
[Cian] You're not a gold digger, are you, Dani?
translation.fr: - Tu es une croqueuse de diamants ?- Oui.

translation.en: -Yeah. -[chuckles] "Yeah."
translation.fr: - Tu es une croqueuse de diamants ?- Oui. - Quoi ?- "Oui."

translation.en: Know what a gold digger is?
Gold digger means they're trying to look for guys who are rich.
translation.fr: Une croqueuse de diamantscourt après les hommes riches.

translation.en: -[uncle] Yes. -[aunt] Is that you?
-Pretty much, but… -[both laugh]
Yeah, I think where that comes from is her dad.
translation.fr: Je crois que c'est à cause de son père.

translation.en: My sister, which is her mom, and her husband were married.
translation.fr: Ma sœur, qui est sa mère,et son mari étaient mariés.

translation.en: He didn't work.
So he was always at home with the girls while my sister was working all the time.
translation.fr: Il restait à la maison avec les fillespendant que ma sœur travaillait.

translation.en: So she doesn't want that.
It's called a dysfunctional upbringing.
Yeah, but you turned out just fine. Both you and your sister, right?
translation.fr: Mais vous vous en êtes bien sortiestoi et ta sœur, non ?

translation.en: -Right? -Yes.
I wanted to find somebody special, somebody who can depend on me.
translation.fr: Je cherchais quelqu'unqui puisse compter sur moi.

translation.en: We want to depend on each other,
and work together to have a sustainable living.
My aunt would tell me,
"There's many fish in the sea. You'll eventually catch a big one."
translation.fr: "Il y a plein de poissons dans la mer.Tu en attraperas un gros.

translation.en: "You'll eventually catch a whale."
Well… [laughs]
It's a metaphor.
You remember your practice boyfriend?
translation.fr: Tu te souviensde ton copain d'entraînement ?

translation.en: Well, um, I do.
[Cian] What's a practice boyfriend, Dani?
A practice boyfriend is, um, somebody that you, um, use for practicing.
[Cian] What kind of things did you practice?
Kissing and, um…
To her, it was just practice. To him, it was like, "I have a girlfriend." [laughs]
translation.fr: Pour elle, c'était un entraînement.Pour lui, une vraie copine.

translation.en: I didn't say, "It's a practice." I never mentioned that.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais ditque c'était un entraînement.

translation.en: -[aunt] So you crushed his heart? -Yeah.
translation.fr: Tu as brisé son cœur ? Oui.

translation.en: Because she wanted to learn how to kiss,
so we looked up a YouTube video about how to learn how to kiss,
translation.fr: on a regardé une vidéo sur YouTubepour apprendre à embrasser,

translation.en: and they used a cupcake to show how to kiss.
translation.fr: ils utilisaient un cupcakepour montrer comment faire.

translation.en: So then she picked that up and started using that with boys.
translation.fr: Elle a appris et a commencéà faire ça avec les garçons.

translation.en: But how do you do it?
Hold up a cupcake, like you're licking the icing.
translation.fr: On prend un cupcakeet on fait comme si on léchait le glaçage.

translation.en: [uncle] So romantic.
-[uncle] No. -[aunt and uncle laugh]
[aunt] Okay, you're grossing out Uncle.
[chuckles] Patrick, you're so sensitive.
I'm Abbey, but my real name is Abigail, but people call me Abbey for short.
translation.fr: Je suis Abbey, mon vrai nom,c'est Abigail, mais on m'appelle Abbey.

translation.en: -[Cian] You are on the spectrum, Abbey? -Yes.
translation.fr: - Tu as un TSA, Abbey ?- Oui.

translation.en: Speaking of, autism makes me feel like not human.
translation.fr: Quand on parle d'autisme,je ne me sens pas humaine.

translation.en: [Cian] Why is that?
I don't know. It's just because I feel like Ariel in The Little Mermaid.
translation.fr: Je sais pas. Je me sens comme Arieldans La Petite Sirène.

translation.en: When I can't get my words out, I feel like Ariel.
translation.fr: Quand mes mots s'emmêlent,je me sens comme Ariel.

translation.en: It's like how I want to be typical, Ariel wants to be a human.
translation.fr: Je veux être neurotypique,comme Ariel veut être humaine.

translation.en: And she becomes human, she can't talk. That's how I feel.
translation.fr: En devenant humaine, elle perd sa voix.C'est ce que je ressens.

translation.en: -[Abbey] Hey, Cian. -[Cian] Hey.
This is my room.
A lot of stuff in it.
translation.fr: Il y a plein de trucs dedans.

translation.en: These are my lions and all that.
translation.fr: Voici mes lions et tous les autres.

translation.en: I love princesses, but I do not like the villains.
translation.fr: J'adore les princesses,mais je n'aime pas les méchants.

translation.en: Villains are kind of…
I think more boys are interested in them.
Girls seem to like stuffed animals and all that,
and I bet the Disney princesses love stuffed animals.
translation.fr: et je parie que les princesses Disneyadorent les peluches.

translation.en: [Cian] So, Abbey, are you looking for love? Yes.
translation.fr: - Alors, Abbey, tu cherches l'amour ?- Oui.

translation.en: 'Cause I wanna be like a princess, like Cinderella going to the ball.
translation.fr: Je veux être comme une princesse,comme Cendrillon qui va au bal.

translation.en: [Cian] And have you been in love before?
Yes, I have. In school, in high school.
Being in love made me feel romantic.
I felt safe, and it meant a lot to me.
translation.fr: Je me sentais protégéeet ça comptait beaucoup pour moi.

translation.en: I'd like to go on a date with a boy who has things in common with me
translation.fr: J'aimerais un petit amiavec qui j'ai des points communs,

translation.en: is what I want, is the most important thing.
So he could understand my autism.
We could do things. We could go to water parks.
translation.fr: qu'on puisse sortir,aller dans des parcs aquatiques.

translation.en: We could go to the beach, the zoo.
Maybe we can go on a double date with another autistic couple.
translation.fr: On pourrait sortiravec un autre couple autiste.

translation.en: Double date!
You're so cute! You're so cute!
[narrator] Abbey lives with her mom, Christine, and her brother, Ben.
translation.fr: Abbey vit avec sa mère Christine,et son frère Ben.

translation.en: Peel and then put it in there, okay?
Okay.
-[Christine] This is messy. -This is a little bit complicated.
This is a mess.
Well, how can you clean it up, girl?
translation.fr: Et si tu essayais de nettoyer ?

translation.en: It's hard.
I saw how Abbey was with her first boyfriend,
translation.fr: J'ai vu comment était Abbeyavec son premier petit ami,

translation.en: and it was truly one of the most beautiful things.
And I want that for her.
translation.fr: et je souhaite ça pour elle.

translation.en: And I know she wants it, but she's a little scared.
translation.fr: Elle le souhaite aussi, mais elle a peur.

translation.en: [Cian] When was Abbey diagnosed with autism?
[Christine] She was maybe two,
and she was putting everything in her mouth, running around…
translation.fr: et mettait tout à la bouche,elle courait partout…

translation.en: It was a chore. I remember thinking, "I can't wait till this stage is over,
translation.fr: C'était dur et j'avais hâteque cette étape soit finie,

translation.en: 'cause this is really awful."
But then I put her in a pre-- preschool
translation.fr: Je l'ai mise à l'école maternelle

translation.en: and four days into it, the preschool called me and said…
translation.fr: et quatre jours plus tard,on m'a appelée pour me dire :

translation.en: [crying] "We can't have your kid in here."
So the journey began.
translation.fr: C'est là que l'aventure a débuté.

translation.en: I took her in, I got her diagnosed, and I didn't want to believe it.
translation.fr: Je l'ai emmenée chez le médecinet le diagnostic est tombé.

translation.en: And on a good note,
what she's doing now,
I could have never imagined she would be capable of doing.
translation.fr: je n'aurais jamais imaginéqu'elle serait capable de le faire.

translation.en: -Abbey, which one is that? -It's Moana.
-That's a Disney thing, right? -Uh-huh.
Oh, wonderful. Okay.
-All right, how was your day today? -You know, it was great.
translation.fr: - Tu as passé une bonne journée ?- Super.

translation.en: You know the actress who does the voice of Moana is Ben's age.
translation.fr: L'actrice qui fait la voix de Moanaa l'âge de Ben.

translation.en: -[man] Okay. -[Cian] Who's this gentleman here, Abbey?
-This is Mike. -Yes.
He's like my stepfather. He has a husband named Bob.
translation.fr: C'est comme mon beau-père.Son mari s'appelle Bob.

translation.en: They're together.
We live in the back.
translation.fr: On vit au fond du jardin.

translation.en: The guesthouse.
[Mike] Dinner's ready.
Oh, Clemmy's here.
She's waiting for--
[Christine] She's waiting for us.
Anything that drops on the ground is Clem's, right?
translation.fr: Tout ce qui tombe par terre,c'est pour Clem.

translation.en: [Christine] So why don't you tell Bob and Mike what you're doing, Abbey?
translation.fr: Dis à Bob et Mike ce que tu vas faire.

translation.en: -She is gonna start going out more, right? -[Abbey] Yeah.
translation.fr: - Elle va commencer à sortir plus souvent.- Oui.

translation.en: [Christine] Maybe go on a few dates.
-Where would be your dream place to go? -A cruise in Africa.
translation.fr: - Où rêves-tu d'aller ?- Une croisière en Afrique.

translation.en: -[Christine] A cruise. -[Abbey] Yeah.
-[Christine] I've not ever been-- -Mm, and an indoor water park.
translation.fr: - Je n'ai jamais…- Et un parc aquatique.

translation.en: It would be nice to see her go out with a nice boy.
translation.fr: Ce serait biende la voir sortir avec un gentil garçon.

translation.en: What do you think, Ben, about your sister going on a date?
translation.fr: Ben, que penses-tu des rencardspour ta sœur ?

translation.en: -[Ben] If she meets the right person… -[Christine] Right?
translation.fr: Si elle rencontre la bonne personne.

translation.en: …that'd be good. I still get those brotherly instincts once in a while.
translation.fr: Ce serait bien. Mais en tant que frère,je suis protecteur.

translation.en: So what else do you want to find in a boyfriend?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu rechercheschez un copain ?

translation.en: He needs to understand my autism.
And he'd have to be funny, like us.
translation.fr: Et doit être drôle, comme nous.

translation.en: -'Cause, you know… -And handsome, like someone at the table.
translation.fr: - Parce que…- Et beau, comme quelqu'un à table.

translation.en: -[Christine laughs] -You guys!
-[Cian] Hello there. -Oh, yes, hello. How are you doing today?
translation.fr: - Bonjour.- Bonjour, comment ça va aujourd'hui ?

translation.en: My name is James. I am 34 years old.
I have Asperger's syndrome. I do not allow it to limit me.
translation.fr: Je suis Asperger.Mais ça ne me limite pas.

translation.en: It does not define me, and yes, I am seeking love.
translation.fr: Ça ne me définit pas,et oui, je cherche l'amour.

translation.en: I'm seeking to find a partner, you know, a soul mate
translation.fr: Je cherche une partenaire, une âme sœur

translation.en: with whom I can spend my life.
At the time that I was diagnosed,
society did not have a great understanding of Asperger's syndrome or autism,
translation.fr: la société ne comprenait pas bienle syndrome d'Asperger ni l'autisme,

translation.en: so, sadly, help-- It was difficult to find help.
translation.fr: alors, c'était difficilede se faire aider.

translation.en: Mm, as sad as it is, other students mocked me and bullied me.
translation.fr: C'est triste, mais mes camaradesse moquaient de moi, me harcelaient.

translation.en: That did have an effect on my self-esteem.
I would always be terribly nervous being in large crowds
translation.fr: J'étais toujours très nerveuxs'il y avait beaucoup de monde

translation.en: or being outside my house for any significant duration.
translation.fr: ou si je restais longtempshors de chez moi.

translation.en: With practice, though, I overcame that.
translation.fr: Mais avec de l'entraînement,j'ai surmonté ça.

translation.en: Now I have no problem at all, becoming more confident
translation.fr: Maintenant, ça va,j'ai plus confiance en moi

translation.en: in being around other people, being in large crowds.
translation.fr: et j'ai moins peur des autreset de la foule.

translation.en: [narrator] James lives with his family in Massachusetts.
translation.fr: James vit avec sa familledans le Massachusetts.

translation.en: All these stones I have over here are certainly not for any practical use,
translation.fr: Toutes les pierres qui sont icine sont pas particulièrement utiles,

translation.en: but they're interesting conversation pieces. They add character to the room.
translation.fr: mais font un bon sujet de conversationet décorent la pièce.

translation.en: This here is a type of glass called fulgurite. It happens when lightning strikes sand.
translation.fr: Ce verre est de la fulgurite et est crééquand la foudre frappe le sable.

translation.en: This is a preserved alligator head from Louisiana.
translation.fr: C'est une tête d'alligator de Louisiane.

translation.en: Isn't that something?
I have a Japanese katana and a European longsword.
translation.fr: J'ai un katana japonaiset une épée à deux mains.

translation.en: This is a cheap display unit.
This one could not be used in battle,
translation.fr: On ne peut pas combattre avec,

translation.en: but this sword is actually fully functional.
I got it at King Richard's Faire from one of their blacksmiths,
translation.fr: Je l'ai achetée à la foire du roi Richard,

translation.en: and the blacksmiths there assured me
that everything they forge, though, is fully functional.
So, yes, I mean, in the rare chance I ever had to use it in battle, I could.
translation.fr: Même si c'est peu probable,je pourrais l'utiliser au combat.

translation.en: "A good friend will bail you out of jail,
translation.fr: "Un bon ami vous sortira de prison,

translation.en: but a true friend will be sitting next to you saying,
translation.fr: "mais un vrai ami sera à vos côtéset dira :

translation.en: 'Damn, that was fun!'"
Yes, I really like that plaque a lot, and…
Oh, these are stamps with classic movie monsters.
translation.fr: Voici des timbresavec des légendes du cinéma.

translation.en: These are stamps with classic American aircraft.
translation.fr: Là, des timbresde vieux avions américains.

translation.en: I'm never going to use them. I'm just keeping those there as conversation pieces.
translation.fr: Je ne les utilise pas.C'est pour faire la conversation.

translation.en: [Cian] Who comes in here for the conversation pieces?
Um, actually, nobody really.
This is… It's just… I guess it's for my own benefit.
I've made myself accounts on various online dating services.
translation.fr: Je me suis inscritsur des sites de rencontres en ligne.

translation.en: There have been times where I… match with… with a… with a woman on the site,
and none of them have ever agreed to meet me in person,
translation.fr: mais aucune n'a accepté de me rencontrer,

translation.en: as sad as that is.
Oh, yeah, see?
This cane here
is made out of bullet casings that have been welded together.
translation.fr: est faite de cartouches videssoudées entre elles.

translation.en: Pretty cool, wouldn't you say?
Show them the cane that belonged to your great-grandfather.
translation.fr: Montre la canne de ton arrière-grand-père.

translation.en: This one?
Oh, yes, this belonged to one of my ancestors.
translation.fr: Oui, ça appartenait à un de mes ancêtres.

translation.en: -He died in 1943. -Okay.
This is my father, Lawrence.
-[Lawrence] Where's Mom? -Oh.
-Come on over, Mom. -[James] Oh.
-Hello. -[James] Uh, yes.
-This is my mother, June. -[June] How are you doing?
translation.fr: - Voici ma mère, June.- Comment ça va ?

translation.en: -I'm feeling slightly nervous. -Can I sit?
Of course. Oh, yes, that's right, Mom, King Richard's Faire will be open soon.
translation.fr: Bien sûr. Au fait, la foire du roi Richardcommence bientôt.

translation.en: Yeah! You were telling me. Wanna sit?
-I'm gonna invite my friends. -What are you going to wear?
translation.fr: - Je vais inviter mes amis.- Tu mettras quoi ?

translation.en: Oh, yes, I'll wear my full… all my medieval regalia, as I so often do.
translation.fr: Je mettrai mes habits médiévaux,comme d'habitude.

translation.en: -[Cian] Can you show it to us? -[groans]
I guess so. Please wait a moment.
-[chuckles] -Okay, so how does this look?
-Isn't that something? -[Lawrence] Yeah. That's great.
-Now, you need a cane, a formal cane. -[June] Don't you have your own cane?
translation.fr: - Il te faut une canne.- Tu as une canne, non ?

translation.en: -What about this one? -Yeah, that's good.
Yes. [chuckles]
What do you think?
[June] It goes great with your dungarees!
translation.fr: Ça va bien avec ton short.

translation.en: Oh, mm, yeah, well, I don't have time to change into all the clothing, you know,
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas le temps de me changerpour mettre le reste,

translation.en: but it's still pretty cool, isn't it?
-[June] It's very cool. -Yes.
Yes. I'm going to put these away.
-Please wait a moment. -[Lawrence] Okay.
All right. Please wait a moment.
He's a very family-oriented young man,
translation.fr: C'est un jeune homme très famille,

translation.en: and, uh, uh… we want… we want the best for him, you know.
translation.fr: et on veut ce qu'il y a de mieux pour lui.

translation.en: Like any parent does.
He's got a very… a very kind heart. Um…
He would do anything for a friend or family.
translation.fr: Il ferait tout pour un ami ou sa famille.

translation.en: We can't wait to see you with a lovely lady.
translation.fr: On a hâte de te voiravec une charmante fille.

translation.en: -Oh, yes. Thank you very much. -[chuckles]
[June] You know what?
We love your hair, James,
but I think, because of the two different colors,
translation.fr: mais comme il y a deux couleurs,

translation.en: it might be a really good idea to professionally have it cut and colored.
translation.fr: ce serait une bonne idéede faire une coupe et une coloration.

translation.en: I do plan to do that.
That way, when you first meet someone, you're gonna make a better impression.
translation.fr: Comme ça, tu feras meilleure impression.

translation.en: [James] Yes. Yes, of course.
You know, as a young man, it's expected of you to attract a young lady, okay?
translation.fr: Tu es un jeune homme,tu dois être attirant pour les filles.

translation.en: And without looking at your watch all the time. -[groans] -You know?
translation.fr: Et tu ne dois pas regarder ta montretout le temps.

translation.en: I'm sorry. Well, I am glad I'm so young from your perspective.
translation.fr: Désolé. Je suis contentque tu me trouves si jeune.

translation.en: You're in competition with all the other young men
translation.fr: Tu es en compétitionavec d'autres jeunes

translation.en: who are trying to pair up -with a young lady, okay? -Yes.
translation.fr: qui essaient de trouver une partenaire.

translation.en: So, it's important for you to make yourself -attractable, okay? -[James] Yes, I know that.
translation.fr: Donc, tu dois êtrele plus présentable possible.

translation.en: [Cian] So, James, we've got a date lined up for you on Saturday.
translation.fr: On a un rencard de prévu pour toi samedi.

translation.en: -Oh, really? That's pretty great. -[June] Oh, wow!
Do I get to come to the restaurant and hide and peek and watch?
translation.fr: Est-ce que je peux venirobserver ce qui se passe au loin ?

translation.en: Give me a break, Mom. I'm 34, okay?
I'm kidding. I'm kidding, sweetie.
[Christine] Clementine, do you need a treat again?
translation.fr: Clementine, tu veux une autre friandise ?

translation.en: This dog could eat all day long.
translation.fr: Ce chien mangerait toute la journée.

translation.en: Is she gonna be a fat dog?
This is LA. You cannot be a fat dog in Los Angeles.
translation.fr: On est à Los Angeles.Impossible d'être un gros chien ici.

translation.en: [Cian] What's the hardest thing about dating?
translation.fr: C'est quoi le plus durdans un rencard ?

translation.en: You have to talk to your boyfriend a lot, and that can be hard for me.
translation.fr: Il faut beaucoup parler et c'est dur pour moi,

translation.en: Like when I was dating Garrett, he was kind of…
translation.fr: comme quand je sortais avec Garrett…

translation.en: He was interested in history, and I wasn't.
translation.fr: il s'intéressait à l'histoire, pas moi.

translation.en: But he did like Star Wars, and I like Star Wars.
translation.fr: Mais il aimait Star Warset moi aussi.

translation.en: We had that in common.
[narrator] Autism expert Jennifer Cook is visiting Abbey
translation.fr: Jennifer Cook, experte en autisme,rend visite à Abbey

translation.en: to help her in her search for love.
translation.fr: pour l'aider dans sa quête amoureuse.

translation.en: I was identified as being on the spectrum about ten years ago,
translation.fr: On m'a diagnostiqué un TSAil y a environ dix ans,

translation.en: and it made everything beforehand in my life make sense.
translation.fr: et ça a donné un sens à ma vie avant ça.

translation.en: [Abbey] Hi.
-Hi, I'm Jennifer. -Hi, I'm Abbey.
-Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you too.
[Jennifer] Autism really means it's a constellation of behaviors and challenges and aptitudes,
translation.fr: L'autisme est une constellationde comportements, de défis et d'aptitudes,

translation.en: but we're all dealing with sensory sensitivities.
translation.fr: mais on a tousdes particularités sensorielles

translation.en: We're all dealing with challenges with social cues.
-Hi. I'm Jennifer. -Hi, Jennifer. I'm Christine.
-Nice to meet you, Christine. -Nice to meet you. Welcome.
But I can promise that what's going on in the inside
translation.fr: Mais ce qui se passe à l'intérieur

translation.en: often has nothing to do with what's shown on the outside.
translation.fr: n'a souvent rien à voiravec ce qu'on montre à l'extérieur.

translation.en: [Abbey] Your hair reminds me of Ariel in The Little Mermaid.
translation.fr: Vos cheveux me rappellent Arieldans La Petite Sirène.

translation.en: -Thank you. -[chuckles]
I really understand Ariel,
because when she was singing her "Part of Your World" song,
translation.fr: car quand elle chantait la chanson"Partir là-bas",

translation.en: she couldn't get the words out.
translation.fr: elle ne trouvait pas ses mots.

translation.en: And when I can't get my words out, I feel exactly like that.
translation.fr: Quand je n'arrive pas à m'exprimer,c'est pareil.

translation.en: That's why I like her so much.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que je l'aime tant.

translation.en: -Abbey, you want to know something? -Yeah.
translation.fr: Je vais te dire un truc.

translation.en: I'm on the spectrum too. -I have autism too. [chuckles] -[gasps] Ooh.
translation.fr: Moi aussi, j'ai un TSA.Je suis autiste.

translation.en: And all three of my kids do too.
So how could you have kids if you're on the spectrum?
translation.fr: Vous avez des enfants avec un TSA ?

translation.en: -You can do anything you want to. -[Christine] It's up to the individual.
translation.fr: - On peut faire ce qu'on veut.- Ça dépend des gens.

translation.en: -It has nothing to do with autism. -Exactly.
translation.fr: - Ça n'a rien à voir avec l'autisme.- Exact.

translation.en: -Exactly right. I know that's-- -Do you take pills?
translation.fr: - Ça n'a rien à voir avec l'autisme.- Exact. Vous prenez des médocs ?

translation.en: -You know what? I do. -Hmm.
-[Jennifer] I do take medicine. Mm-hmm. -Do they make pills for pets?
translation.fr: Je prends des médicaments. Il y a des médocs pour animaux ?

translation.en: They do make pills for pets.
[Christine] We can take left turns in the conversation.
translation.fr: Il lui arrive de changer de sujet.

translation.en: -I know. I know. -So I'm just giving you that heads-up.
translation.fr: - Je sais.- Juste pour vous prévenir.

translation.en: No, I get it, and that's okay.
translation.fr: Je comprends, et c'est pas grave.

translation.en: Do you like Mike Myers?
-[Jennifer] I've never met him. -Me neither.
translation.fr: - Je ne l'ai jamais rencontré.- Pareil.

translation.en: -What were you thinking about before? -[Abbey] I don't know.
translation.fr: - Tu disais quoi avant ?- Je sais pas.

translation.en: -It just popped into my head. -Okay. That's fine. That's fine.
translation.fr: Ça m'est venu à l'esprit. Ce n'est pas grave.

translation.en: Tell me about your dating history.
Dated a boy named Garrett in high school.
translation.fr: Je suis sortie avec Garrett au lycée.

translation.en: -Okay. -[Abbey] I loved it.
-[Jennifer] Okay. -I had fun.
So when you're going on a date,
what you're really doing is you're trying to make a friend, okay?
translation.fr: on essaie de s'en faire un ami.

translation.en: We want to ask questions as well as give answers.
translation.fr: On veut poser des questionset donner des réponses.

translation.en: And there are some things that I know you like to talk about
translation.fr: Il y a des choses dont tu aimes parler

translation.en: and some things that maybe your date would like to talk about.
translation.fr: et d'autres,dont ton copain aimerait parler.

translation.en: So what are the things that you like to talk about the most, do you think?
translation.fr: De quoi aimes-tu le plus parler ?

translation.en: -Okay. -[Abbey] Going to the zoo.
[Jennifer] Great.
I like watching African safari animals and sea animals.
translation.fr: Regarder les animaux sauvagesd'Afrique et les animaux marins.

translation.en: -Documentaries… -[Jennifer] I love documentaries.
…about wild animals.
Cool, so what we want to do is,
if this is sort of like your conversation during your date,
translation.fr: ceci est ta conversationpendant le rencard,

translation.en: then what you want to do is make sure that we leave enough room
translation.fr: et tu dois t'assurerde laisser assez de place

translation.en: for what your date might want to talk about, so maybe your date…
translation.fr: à un sujet de discussionqui plaît aussi à ton ami…

translation.en: Let's come up with some things that he likes to talk about.
translation.fr: Trouvons des chosesdont il aimerait parler.

translation.en: Maybe he likes to talk about music, gaming.
translation.fr: Il aime peut-être la musique,les jeux vidéo.

translation.en: -[Abbey] Video games? -[Jennifer] Mm-hmm.
-Ooh. -[Jennifer] You like video games too, huh? Candy Crush is like a video game.
translation.fr: - Toi aussi tu aimes ça ?- Candy Crush est comme un jeu vidéo.

translation.en: You just did something really good.
-Do you know what you did? -What?
You just found your first common interest, because if this is your conversation,
translation.fr: Tu as trouvévotre premier point commun. Dans ta conversation,

translation.en: you gotta make sure that, with all that you want to talk about,
translation.fr: en plus de toutce dont tu as envie de parler,

translation.en: we have to make sure there's room in the air
translation.fr: tu dois laisser de la place

translation.en: for somebody else's words too.
Come on over here with me on the floor. I'll sit over here.
translation.fr: Assieds-toi par terre.Je vais me mettre là.

translation.en: Perfect. So I'm gonna roll this to you, but I'm gonna roll a bunch of them.
translation.fr: Super. Je vais les faire rouler vers toi,il y en a plusieurs.

translation.en: -Ready? -Yeah.
So what do you like to do?
-What's your favorite color? -My favorite--
-Do you like dogs? -Yes. My favorite color's--
translation.fr: - Tu aimes les chiens ?- Oui. Ma…

translation.en: -What'll you do tomorrow? -That's a lot of questions.
translation.fr: - Tu fais quoi demain ?- Ça en fait des questions.

translation.en: It is a lot of questions!
When somebody asks you a lot of questions like that,
translation.fr: Quand quelqu'un te posebeaucoup de questions,

translation.en: it's hard to figure them out and listen to what they're saying,
translation.fr: c'est dur de répondreet d'écouter ce qu'il dit,

translation.en: which means I didn't get to know anything about Abbey.
translation.fr: ce qui veut direque je n'ai rien appris sur Abbey.

translation.en: -Right? -Yeah.
Okay, so let's try something different.
Will you roll the balls back at me?
What's your favorite thing to do?
I like to play with my dog.
What's your favorite thing to do?
Work out and swim.
Roll it back to me. Okay, great.
-What do you like best about swimming? -'Cause mermaids swim.
translation.fr: - Pourquoi tu aimes nager ?- Car les sirènes nagent.

translation.en: I don't wanna go too far. There's dangerous animals.
translation.fr: Je ne nage pas loin,ça peut être dangereux.

translation.en: Roll it back. Good answer.
Yeah, that's true. Sharks can be scary, right?
translation.fr: C'est vrai. Les requins ça fait peur.

translation.en: Speaking of sharks, I've been watching a movie called Soul Surfer.
translation.fr: En parlant de requins,j'ai regardé le film Soul Surfer.

translation.en: Tell me more about that.
About a girl was surfing with her friend, and a shark bit her arm off.
translation.fr: Une fille surfait avec son amieet un requin lui a arraché le bras.

translation.en: Yes. I saw her.
She did amazing things all around the world,
translation.fr: Elle a fait des choses incroyables

translation.en: even though she had one arm.
translation.fr: même si elle n'a qu'un seul bras.

translation.en: How?
Well, I think a lot of determination. Do you think so?
translation.fr: Avec beaucoup de détermination.Tu es d'accord ?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Do you know what you just did?
translation.fr: - Oui.- Tu sais ce que tu as fait ?

translation.en: -What? -You just had a conversation with me.
translation.fr: - Quoi ?- Tu as fait la conversation.

translation.en: -Oh my gosh! -[Jennifer laughs]
You stayed on the topic. That made perfect sense to me.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas changé de sujet.C'était logique.

translation.en: And we talked about it together.
May I shake your hand? -Yes! -Yes!
translation.fr: - Je peux te serrer la main ?- Oui !

translation.en: -Yes! -That was awesome.
Abbey's primary challenge, I think, is going to be staying in the moment.
translation.fr: Le défi d'Abbey,est de rester dans le sujet.

translation.en: She's changing topic because her mind is catching so much interest.
translation.fr: Elle change de sujet, car son esprits'intéresse à plein de choses.

translation.en: It's being able to put words to that
in a way which also brings the other person along,
translation.fr: de façon à aussi impliquerl'autre personne,

translation.en: so if she can do that,
then all of her flight of thought
is actually gonna be great and interesting and fun and make for a great date.
translation.fr: créera une conversation intéressante,ce sera un super rencard.

translation.en: It was really nice to meet you.
translation.fr: J'ai été ravie de te connaître.

translation.en: [Abbey] It was really nice to meet you too.
[Jennifer] Thank you very much.
-Thank you. -Thank you.
-It was great to meet you. -Yeah, really nice to meet you too.
translation.fr: - Ce fut un plaisir.- Oui, également.

translation.en: -Thank you so much. -I can't wait to hear how it all goes.
translation.fr: - Merci.- J'ai hâte de voir ce que ça donne.

translation.en: Bye.
Bye.
Thanks again.
Okay, Abbey, do you want a sandwich?
Animation is my greatest passion. [Cian] Tell me about your company.
translation.fr: - L'animation est ma passion.- Parle-moi de ton studio d'animation.

translation.en: I got the inspiration from Satoshi Tajiri, the creator of Pokémon.
translation.fr: J'ai été inspirée par Satoshi Tajiri,le créateur de Pokémon.

translation.en: And he's on the autism spectrum, which is amazing.
translation.fr: Et il est autiste, ce qui est incroyable.

translation.en: He started his company, Game Freak, when he was 17,
translation.fr: Il a lancé sa société, Game Freak,à 17 ans,

translation.en: so I started my animation company at age 14.
translation.fr: alors, j'ai monté ma société d'animationà 14 ans.

translation.en: It was fully launched with the help of my…
translation.fr: Je l'ai créée avec l'aide de…

translation.en: with my aunt and uncle.
[Cian] So you teach animation to people on the spectrum?
That is true. It's good to see their work shine.
translation.fr: Exact.C'est bien de voir leur travail briller.

translation.en: -[Dani] Ready? -[Cian] I'm ready.
This is my office.
Right here is my collection of all kinds of achievements
translation.fr: UNE ADO CRÉE SA SOCIÉTÉ Voici tout ce que j'ai accompli

translation.en: that I've, um, earned over these years.
translation.fr: au cours de ces dernières années.

translation.en: These are the flyers that I passed out when I was at San Diego Comic-Con.
translation.fr: Voici les flyers que j'ai distribuésau Comic-Con de San Diego.

translation.en: [high-pitched voice] "Hi, everybody. Mindy Da Vinci Lavender here."
translation.fr: Salut, tout le monde.C'est Mindy Da Vinci Lavender.

translation.en: That's Mindy's voice. She's named after my dog,
translation.fr: C'est la voix de Mindy,appelée pour mon chien.

translation.en: and her personality is pretty much based upon my optimistic, happy self.
translation.fr: Sa personnalité s'inspirede mon optimisme et ma joie de vivre.

translation.en: Best of all, there's even Bachelor's of Fine Arts,
translation.fr: Et surtout,voici ma licence en beaux-arts,

translation.en: Master's of Business Administration.
The more awards I get, I think I need a bigger house.
translation.fr: Avec tous ces prix,il faut une plus grande maison.

translation.en: My ideal partner would be somebody who is running another company.
translation.fr: Mon partenaire idéal serait quelqu'unqui dirige aussi une entreprise.

translation.en: Not only we see each other like lovers, but also work partners.
translation.fr: On serait des amants,mais aussi des associés.

translation.en: [Cian] So it sounds like you want your love life and your work life to almost be entwined.
translation.fr: Tu veux que ta vie amoureuseet ta vie professionnelle soient liées.

translation.en: Into one.
Like a helix of a DNA structure.
[narrator] In Hollywood, Dani is meeting her good friend Devin for a drink.
translation.fr: À Hollywood, Dani va boire un verreavec son ami Devin.

translation.en: Oh, hey, how are you?
Nice to see you.
-How are you? -Good, fine, thank you so much, Devin.
translation.fr: - Comment ça va ?- Bien, merci beaucoup, Devin.

translation.en: Wow, this place is like… it reminds me of art, of France.
translation.fr: Cet endroit me rappelle l'art, la France.

translation.en: But did you know in France,
they have the biggest animation festival in the whole world?
translation.fr: il y a le plus grand festival d'animationau monde ?

translation.en: You talk about animation nonstop.
It's so funny.
I want to hear about your dating life.
-Okay. -How has that been going?
I'm about to start dating again.
[Devin] I know. What made you decide to start dating again?
'Cause the last real one was maybe a few years ago or…
translation.fr: La dernière fois,c'était il y a quelques années…

translation.en: Yeah, it's because, um… oh, I felt so lonely.
translation.fr: Oui, car… je me sentais seule.

translation.en: I'm stuck between a rock and a hard place.
translation.fr: Je suis entre le marteau et l'enclume.

translation.en: A lot of people on the autism spectrum think I'm too smart and too motivated,
translation.fr: Les autistes me trouventtrop intelligente et trop déterminée

translation.en: while neurotypicals think I'm too strange.
translation.fr: et les neurotypiquesme trouvent trop bizarre.

translation.en: Just wanna be sure they're motivated enough and have a good sense of hygiene.
translation.fr: Je veux quelqu'un de déterminéet avec un bon sens de l'hygiène.

translation.en: And you're looking for a guy with pretty much no facial hair, right?
translation.fr: Et un mec pas trop barbu.

translation.en: Yeah.
I take insult to that. What is wrong with facial hair?
translation.fr: C'est vexant.Que reproches-tu à la barbe ?

translation.en: -I don't like the bushy stuff. -Oh my God!
translation.fr: - Je n'aime pas les trucs touffus.- Incroyable.

translation.en: How has your dating life been?
I got myself a fourth date coming up.
-[Dani] Oh, wow. -Same girl.
This is fabulous.
I know.
What are you hoping, eventually, when you do find love?
'Cause I know it's gonna happen. Are you wanting to get married, have kids?
translation.fr: car tu le trouveras,tu veux te marier, des enfants ?

translation.en: I've always wanted to get married and hopefully have a surrogate child.
translation.fr: J'ai toujours voulu me marieret faire appel à une mère porteuse.

translation.en: So you're not ever gonna get pregnant in your life?
translation.fr: Tu ne veux pas tomber enceinte ?

translation.en: Yeah, because I can imagine labor's gonna really hurt.
-Oh, thank you so much. -Thank you.
Cheers to us autistic people
that are coming over leaps and bounds
translation.fr: qui relevons les défis à pas de géant,

translation.en: through our crazy lives growing up, to now possibly one day finding love.
translation.fr: depuis notre enfance folle jusqu'à aujourd'hui,dans l'espoir de trouver l'amour.

translation.en: Cheers. You find your Prince Charming.
I find my Cinderella. Bam!
Bam!
[narrator] Abbey is getting ready to step out on her first blind date.
translation.fr: Abbey se préparepour son premier rencard à l'aveugle.

translation.en: This is getting all over the place here.
translation.fr: Ça déborde un peu par ici.

translation.en: -You're starting to look like Bette Davis. -No, I don't look like a witch.
translation.fr: - Tu ressembles à Bette Davis.- J'ai pas l'air d'une sorcière.

translation.en: -It won't come off. It's like supersonic. -I want to look like a princess.
translation.fr: - Ça part pas. C'est tenace.- Je veux être une princesse.

translation.en: -[Christine] Come on, princess. -I want to look like a princess.
translation.fr: - Viens.- Je veux être une princesse.

translation.en: [Christine] Stand up. Look in the mirror.
translation.fr: Viens te regarder dans la glace.

translation.en: What do you think?
Pretty good.
Do a fashion pose.
-Are we ready to rock and roll? -[Abbey] Yeah.
-[Christine] Here we go. -[Abbey] Let's go. Ah!
[man] Hey, western screech owl.
[narrator] Abbey is meeting David.
He likes lions
and being in a car wash.
He doesn't like horror movies
or clowns.
-[Abbey] Hey. -Hey.
Hey, it's nice to meet you. Oh, I like your shirt.
translation.fr: Ravie de te rencontrer. J'aime ta chemise.

translation.en: I see you have sharks on your shirt. Thank you.
translation.fr: - Il y a des requins sur ta chemise.- Merci.

translation.en: -That's so cool. What's your name? -David.
-Nice to meet you. -What's yours?
-I'm Abbey. Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you too, Abbey.
It's so nice.
What's your favorite animal? The African lion.
translation.fr: - Quel est ton animal préféré ?- Le lion.

translation.en: [Abbey] Me too!
You know they made a live-action version of The Lion King and… with Beyoncé?
translation.fr: Tu sais qu'il y a un nouveauRoi Lion, en film, avec Beyoncé ?

translation.en: Wow, I did not know that.
Yeah, she has an amazing voice.
translation.fr: Oui, elle a une voix incroyable.

translation.en: I've been to Africa, since winter break.
translation.fr: Je suis allé en Afriqueaprès les vacances d'hiver.

translation.en: -You have? -Yes.
[Abbey] Oh, I'm so jealous.
I want to go too.
Going to Africa costs a lot of money.
-It's too expensive. -[David] Yeah.
My mom can't afford it just yet. She doesn't have enough money.
translation.fr: Ma mère n'a pas assez d'argent.

translation.en: I know, but she's working on it.
translation.fr: Je sais, mais elle y travaille.

translation.en: -If we're a billionaire… -Yeah. Mm-hmm.
I was wondering, how old are you?
I'm 26. How about you?
-Twenty-three. -Wow.
-We're both in our twenties. -Yep.
translation.fr: On a tous les deux la vingtaine.

translation.en: You're not far from my age.
What's your favorite thing to get at In-N-Out?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu aimes mangerau fast-food ?

translation.en: Only a plain cheeseburger. What about you?
-I went to In-N-Out yesterday. -What did you like to get from In-N-Out?
translation.fr: - J'y suis allée hier.- Qu'est-ce que tu as commandé ?

translation.en: I like the cheese fries, but I just don't eat them every day
translation.fr: J'aime les frites au fromage,mais pas tous les jours,

translation.en: 'cause I know it's not good for you.
translation.fr: ce n'est pas bon pour la santé.

translation.en: Where's the owl?
[David] It's right there.
They call it the western screech owl.
[Abbey] Aw. Hi, owl!
Let's go look at some animals.
Great. Can't wait to take pictures of the ones I like.
translation.fr: Super. J'ai hâte de photographierceux que j'aime.

translation.en: [Abbey] Oh, a big snake.
Ooh, I'll add that to the collection.
translation.fr: Je vais l'ajouter à ma collection.

translation.en: [Abbey] Aw! Look at the little monkey!
They're called the common squirrel monkeys.
[Abbey] Oh, they're so cute.
There's a lemur.
[David] Aw, lemurs!
They're so cute.
[David gasps] Look at the porcupine. Wow!
-Porcupine. -Yeah.
[David] Be careful. Their quills are spiky.
Oh, look at the big birds. Those are eagles.
translation.fr: Regarde les gros oiseaux.Ce sont des aigles.

translation.en: -[David] Wow. -They kind of look a little aggressive.
translation.fr: Ils ont l'air un peu agressifs.

translation.en: Yeah. Only when they're on the hunt.
-And their claws are as big as my hand. -Wow.
translation.fr: Leurs griffes sont aussi grandesque ma main.

translation.en: -Almost. -Yeah.
Is he trying to use his words?
'Cause they can't talk.
Maybe they want something.
At least they can do a screech.
translation.fr: Au moins, il peut pousser un cri.

translation.en: -Yes, that's how they communicate. -[David] Wow!
-Oh, he pooped! -Ugh.
[Abbey] What's your favorite bird? [David] I love all birds.
translation.fr: - Quel est ton oiseau préféré ?- Je les aime tous.

translation.en: -Do you like storks? -Mm-hmm.
-Herons? -Yes.
-But do you like falcons? -[David] Yes.
-Pelicans? -Yes.
-Parrots? -[David] Yes.
Me too.
[David] Look at them falling in love with each other.
translation.fr: Regarde, ils sont en trainde tomber amoureux.

translation.en: [Abbey] Cute.
Hello, you two adorable kitties.
-[Abbey] I love cats. -[David] Mm-hmm.
I am a cat person.
[Abbey] Me too.
This is so fun.
Yes.
I love this place.
Thanks. So do I.
Let's just sit on the bench and just enjoy.
translation.fr: Asseyons-nous un peu sur le banc.

translation.en: [Cian] Can you describe your ideal partner?
I would like a woman who is similar to me, but not an exact copy, obviously.
translation.fr: Une femme qui me ressemble,mais pas une copie exacte, évidemment.

translation.en: I wouldn't expect to find a woman who was a radiant, unearthly beauty,
translation.fr: Je ne m'attends pas à trouverune femme d'une beauté fatale,

translation.en: but, obviously, I want a woman who is still fairly attractive.
translation.fr: mais elle doit tout de mêmeêtre assez belle.

translation.en: A woman who's attractive to the point that when I see her,
translation.fr: Assez belle pour que, quand je la regarde,

translation.en: I do not feel a desire to avert my gaze, you know?
translation.fr: je n'ai pas envie de détourner les yeux.

translation.en: And a woman who is, you know, who is very big on hygiene and well groomed.
translation.fr: Et elle doit accorder de l'importanceà son hygiène et à son apparence.

translation.en: I don't think that's asking too much, is it?
translation.fr: Et elle doit accorder de l'importanceà son hygiène et à son apparence. Ce n'est pas trop demander, n'est-ce pas ?

translation.en: I hope not.
[narrator] As he readies himself to get back into the dating world,
translation.fr: Alors qu'il se prépare à renoueravec les rencards,

translation.en: James is meeting his younger brother William for dinner.
translation.fr: James va dîner avec William,son frère cadet.

translation.en: Hey. How's it going?
-Good seeing ya. -I'm doing just fine. How are you doing?
translation.fr: - Content de te revoir.- Ça va. Et toi ?

translation.en: [William] Good. Good. Doing well.
Okay. Good. Good.
Glad to hear that.
How was your day?
Oh, Nothing out of the ordinary happened, which is how I prefer it.
translation.fr: Il ne s'est rien passé d'inhabituel,je préfère ça.

translation.en: -Yes. Yes. -Oh, that's a good thing.
So what's been going on lately?
[splutters] Oh, well, actually, I have a date on Saturday night.
translation.fr: En fait, j'ai un rencard samedi soir.

translation.en: -Really? -I'm quite excited about that.
Hopefully she'll have a good personality, and hopefully I'll get along with her.
translation.fr: J'espère qu'elle sera sympaet qu'on s'entendra bien.

translation.en: Yeah, that's exciting. Good for you.
So I don't know if you've heard yet, but Uncle Henry has a new girlfriend.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas si tu es au courant,mais oncle Henry a une nouvelle copine.

translation.en: -Oh, really? -Yes. Yes.
He apparently met her online, so he's had…
translation.fr: Il l'a rencontrée sur Internet, il a eu…

translation.en: Despite his age, he's had more success with online dating than I have.
translation.fr: Malgré son âge,il a eu plus de succès que moi.

translation.en: Well, hey, maybe you and he will both have new girlfriends at the same time.
translation.fr: Vous aurez peut-êtreune nouvelle copine en même temps.

translation.en: That would be something.
It's definitely, uh… Look at that.
A mai tai for you, and the food is on its way, okay?
translation.fr: Un Mai Tai pour vous,les plats arrivent.

translation.en: -Cool. Thank you. Appreciate it. -Nice. Thank you.
That's right. Cheers to your date this Saturday.
translation.fr: Oui, à ton rencard de samedi.

translation.en: That's amazing.
When you're asking her questions and things like that,
translation.fr: Quand tu lui poses des questions,

translation.en: make sure it's not like you're just going through a checklist,
translation.fr: ça ne doit pas avoir l'aird'une checklist,

translation.en: -like asking one, asking the next. -Certainly not.
Ask a few different questions, a few follow-up questions,
like, you know, so that way it kind of really shows that genuine interest.
translation.fr: comme ça, tu montresque tu t'intéresses vraiment à elle.

translation.en: You do a good amount of talking,
but at the same time, make sure that she's able to contribute just as much.
translation.fr: mais tu dois veiller à ce qu'elle puissecontribuer également.

translation.en: Yes.
Basically like, very much a fifty-fifty interaction.
It's a way for her to build confidence.
It helps, you know, say, "Okay, this guy really truly is interested in me."
translation.fr: Elle pensera :"Ce type s'intéresse vraiment à moi."

translation.en: -Fish tacos. -All right.
Look at that.
And the grilled…
-Very nice, thank you very much. -Wow.
-You guys enjoy. -Thank you.
-That looks good. -Ah. Yes.
So if you were to say what you, uh… what you're looking for in a girl,
translation.fr: Si tu devais décrirece que tu cherches chez une fille,

translation.en: what would you say?
Someone with whom I feel a close special bond
translation.fr: Quelqu'un pour qui je ressensun lien spécial

translation.en: and someone whose presence enhances my life
translation.fr: et dont la présence me rend heureux

translation.en: and makes life feel more vibrant, more energetic, and colorful.
translation.fr: et rend la vie plus belle,plus dynamique et colorée.

translation.en: That's good.
May I have some of your french fries, please?
translation.fr: - Je peux goûter tes frites ?- Oui.

translation.en: -Sure. -Oh, yes, thank you.
I suppose maybe it would probably be okay, you know,
translation.fr: Je pense que ça pourrait être bien

translation.en: on a first date, to give someone a compliment
translation.fr: de la complimenterlors du premier rencard,

translation.en: on their clothing or jewelry or whatever,
translation.fr: sur ses vêtements ou ses bijoux,

translation.en: but it might not be so good to comment on their hair or body, I'd have to imagine.
translation.fr: mais peut-être pas sur ses cheveuxou son corps, j'imagine.

translation.en: [laughs] No, probably not.
If a woman told me she didn't like my hairstyle,
translation.fr: Si elle me ditqu'elle n'aime pas ma coiffure,

translation.en: I probably wouldn't want to have a second date with her, for instance.
translation.fr: je ne voudrais pasd'un deuxième rendez-vous avec elle.

translation.en: [Abbey] The topic we're gonna talk about is sea creatures.
Oh, yes.
What's your favorite creatures that live in the sea?
translation.fr: Quels sont tes animaux marins préférés ?

translation.en: I like mermaids, but they don't exist.
translation.fr: J'aime les sirènes,mais elles n'existent pas.

translation.en: Like, I really understood the story of The Little Mermaid when I was younger.
translation.fr: J'ai compris l'histoire deLa Petite Sirène quand j'étais petite.

translation.en: But now I don't need to apply… that no longer applies to me.
translation.fr: Mais maintenant…ça ne s'applique plus à moi.

translation.en: -Wow. -'Cause I've come so far since then.
The Little Mermaid is one -of the list of my favorite movies. -Me too.
translation.fr: La Petite Sirèneest l'un de mes films préférés.

translation.en: [Abbey] Hi, owl.
-Hi, guys. -Is he a mean owl?
She is actually very nice.
[chuckles] Now these guys are one of the largest types of owls in the world.
translation.fr: Ils font partie des plus gros hibouxau monde.

translation.en: -[David] Hi, big owl. -[laughs]
-[woman] What do you think? -It seems gentle.
translation.fr: - Qu'en penses-tu ?- Il a l'air gentil.

translation.en: What do you like to do for fun?
Oh, so they don't speak human.
When you're turning your head, we have seven neck bones.
translation.fr: Pour tourner la tête,on a sept vertèbres.

translation.en: These guys have 14,
so they have twice as many as us.
translation.fr: ils en ont deux fois plus que nous.

translation.en: -[woman] Ready to meet a sloth? -[Abbey] Yeah.
-Let's talk about sloths. -[woman] Come with me this way.
So sloths hang upside down their whole entire lives.
translation.fr: Les paresseux se suspendent toujoursà l'envers.

translation.en: They're never right side up like us.
translation.fr: Ils ne sont jamais à l'endroit,comme nous.

translation.en: They sleep all day long. They sleep between 15 and 20 hours every day.
translation.fr: Ils dorment toute la journée.Entre 15 et 20 heures par jour.

translation.en: [David] Hey, sloth.
[Abbey] Look at the tiny little fox.
[woman] Those are our fennec foxes.
-[David] They're-- -[Abbey] Do they yip?
-They make high-pitched screeching noises. -Like, "Ah!"
translation.fr: - Ils poussent des cris aigus.- Comme…

translation.en: -Yes, a bit like that. -They're from the north of Africa.
translation.fr: - Oui.- Ils viennent d'Afrique du Nord.

translation.en: -[woman] Have you been to Africa? -[David] Yes.
translation.fr: - Tu es allé en Afrique ?- Oui.

translation.en: And I'm gonna go there again in a heartbeat. And Abbey?
translation.fr: Et j'y retournerai de bon cœur. Et toi ?

translation.en: Me too. My heart will be beating, but it always does.
translation.fr: Moi aussi. Mon cœur est bon.

translation.en: If it weren't, I wouldn't be on Earth.
translation.fr: Sinon, je ne serais pas en vie.

translation.en: -[David] Yeah. -Very true.
How would you like to come to Africa with me?
translation.fr: Tu veux venir en Afrique avec moi ?

translation.en: Yes, I would love that. My heart's gonna beat so fast.
translation.fr: Oui, j'adorerais.Mon cœur battra la chamade.

translation.en: [David] I really had fun seeing the animals with you.
translation.fr: J'ai adoré voir les animaux avec toi.

translation.en: Me too.
I had a total fun blast with you.
translation.fr: Je me suis super bien amusée avec toi.

translation.en: Before you go, I think I have something special for you.
translation.fr: Avant que tu partes,j'ai quelque chose pour toi.

translation.en: What?
Here you go.
Okay.
What is it?
-What is it? -It's a flamingo bracelet.
translation.fr: - C'est quoi ?- C'est un bracelet flamant rose.

translation.en: -I got it from San Clemente. -Oh my God.
translation.fr: - Je l'ai acheté à San Clemente.- Génial.

translation.en: You did? Is it in Africa?
-Like from Africa. -Oh my God, I love it so much.
Allow me to get that for you.
Thanks.
[Abbey] It's got a flamingo. I like it.
translation.fr: Il y a un flamant rose. J'adore.

translation.en: I'm glad you do.
Thanks.
Will I see you again?
Maybe one day. I'll think about it. I'll let my mom know.
translation.fr: Peut-être, je vais réfléchir.Je le dirai à ma mère.

translation.en: Take all the time you need.
-Okay. -Bye.
Bye.
Bye.
[Cian] Do you believe in love at first sight?
translation.fr: - Tu crois au coup de foudre ?- Oui.

translation.en: I do. It's like, wow, this could be the greatest opportunity
translation.fr: - Tu crois au coup de foudre ?- Oui. C'est une super occasionpour mieux connaître une personne.

translation.en: to get to know the person more.
translation.fr: C'est une super occasionpour mieux connaître une personne.

translation.en: I'm hungry for more.
It's the power of, um… power of love.
-[aunt] Are you going to… -Put on my makeup.
translation.fr: - Tu vas…- Je vais me maquiller.

translation.en: [narrator] Dani is getting ready to head to downtown LA
translation.fr: Dani se prépare à allerau centre-ville de Los Angeles

translation.en: for a first date.
-[Cian] How are you feeling, Dani? -I am doing great.
translation.fr: - Comment tu te sens, Dani ?- Très bien.

translation.en: Just putting on the magical touches
to show my dream boyfriend.
translation.fr: pour le petit ami de mes rêves.

translation.en: [Cian] Can't guarantee he's your dream boyfriend, but you never know.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas te garantir ça,mais qui sait ?

translation.en: [Dani] That's right.
[aunt] You ready?
[Dani] I am ready, Sandy.
A little nervous.
-Maybe you should have a shot of tequila. -Thanks, Sandy.
translation.fr: - Tu devrais boire un shot de tequila.- Merci.

translation.en: -Thanks for your suggestion. -So you could relax.
translation.fr: - Merci pour ton offre.- Pour déstresser.

translation.en: Okay.
[Sandy] Just one shot.
Here's to your first date in two years.
translation.fr: À ton premier rencard en deux ans.

translation.en: Okay.
[Sandy] Yep.
Looks are a bonus, they're beautiful, but it can also be a bit seductive,
translation.fr: S'il est beau, c'est top,mais il pourrait être séducteur,

translation.en: so I try to be very careful.
I always get attracted to some people with long hair, shoulder-length hair.
translation.fr: Je suis souvent attirée par les garçonsqui ont les cheveux longs ou mi-longs.

translation.en: Especially some androgynous-looking guy, that I really love.
[Cian] Do you find that sometimes you can find yourself attracted to someone,
translation.fr: Ça t'arrive d'être attirée par quelqu'un,

translation.en: but you think, "Hang on, Dani, that person isn't right for me 'cause--"
translation.fr: mais de penser :"Cette personne n'est pas pour moi."

translation.en: Yeah.
He could be lazy or manipulative.
Adjust my hair, adjust that.
[narrator] Dani is meeting Solomon.
He likes writing poetry
and good vibes.
He doesn't like messy eaters
translation.fr: Il n'aime pasles gens qui mangent mal

translation.en: or aggressive birds.
-My name is Solomon. -I'm Dani. Nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you too.
-These are for you. -Oh, lovely flowers bouquet.
translation.fr: - C'est pour toi.- Le joli bouquet.

translation.en: That's so wonderful. Thank you so much.
Any time.
So how are you doing?
I'm doing fine, great.
Sorry, I'm kind of nervous.
-Yeah. -I'm nervous too.
Yeah, so, um…
I'm sorry, I'm just kind of nervous.
-Have you ever been on blind dates before? -I haven't, no.
translation.fr: - Tu as déjà eu des rencards arrangés ?- Non.

translation.en: Same here.
So what are your interests?
My interests, I do animation.
I teach animation to youth on the autism spectrum.
That's really cool. How long have you been doing that for?
translation.fr: C'est cool.Tu fais ça depuis combien de temps ?

translation.en: I guess I've been doing animation ever since 14.
translation.fr: Je fais de l'animationdepuis que j'ai 14 ans.

translation.en: -A long time. -Wow.
-Fourteen? -Yep.
That's a good passion.
Well, I just finished, you know, my AA degree at Santa Monica College.
translation.fr: Je viens de finir un DEUGà l'université de Santa Monica.

translation.en: [Dani] Oh, wow.
I'm majoring in Communication, like, Studies,
so I'm gonna be working with kids, like, that have disabilities
translation.fr: je vais travailleravec des enfants handicapés

translation.en: and just teaching them, like, how to do the right stuff and--
translation.fr: et leur apprendre à faire plein de choses…

translation.en: This is perfect.
Yeah, yeah. I just want to teach them my perspective,
and, like, what I went through, and how I became the person I am today.
translation.fr: et comment je suis devenula personne que je suis aujourd'hui.

translation.en: And I got into the Law of Attraction. You know what that is?
translation.fr: Je me suis intéresséà la loi de l'attraction. Tu connais ?

translation.en: Law of Attraction? What's this about?
So it's about when you spread good vibes,
translation.fr: Quand on diffuse de bonnes ondes,

translation.en: like, you attract that good energy and they give it back to you.
translation.fr: on attire de la bonne énergieet on te la renvoie.

translation.en: It's very powerful.
I tried it with friends and family, and my relationships are through the roof now.
translation.fr: J'ai essayé avec mes amis, ma familleet mes relations sont géniales.

translation.en: I really want to find my soul mate,
translation.fr: Je veux vraiment trouver mon âme sœur,

translation.en: and that's why I started the Law of Attraction as well too,
translation.fr: C'est pour ça quej'ai essayé la loi de l'attraction,

translation.en: to, like, actually, you know, find that abundance in my life, so…
translation.fr: pour trouver cette abondance dans ma vie…

translation.en: Thank you.
Thank you so much.
-[waitress] Of course. Enjoy. -Yeah, thank you.
Do you like anime?
Yeah, I watch some of it. Not all the time though.
translation.fr: Oui, j'en regarde. Pas tout le temps.

translation.en: Have you ever been to San Diego Comic-Con?
translation.fr: Tu es déjà allé au Comic-Conde San Diego ?

translation.en: -I have, yeah. -[Dani] You did?!
Yeah, it's really nice.
Oh my goodness.
I gotta use the restroom for a second. Be right back.
translation.fr: Je dois aller aux toilettes. Je reviens.

translation.en: Okay.
[Dani] What are your first impressions?
Solomon. Oh, he is so attractive.
I mean, not just attractive from the looks,
translation.fr: C'est pas seulement qu'il est beau,

translation.en: but also, like, we have something in common.
translation.fr: on a aussi un point commun.

translation.en: Helping people of different disabilities, including autism, be themselves,
translation.fr: Aider les gens avec des handicaps,comme l'autisme, à être eux-mêmes

translation.en: and it's like, oh, I'm just so nervous, and…
translation.fr: et… je suis super stressée, et…

translation.en: Oh, by the way, I'm just… in love.
We also share lots of hobbies.
translation.fr: On a des hobbies en commun.

translation.en: -[Cian] Did you just say you're in love? -Yes.
translation.fr: - Tu viens de dire que tu es amoureuse ?- Oui.

translation.en: Hey, I'm back.
[Solomon] Hey.
I'm just very…
so authentic about spirituality and just with the Law of Attraction. Like, I just love it so much.
translation.fr: enthousiaste au sujet de la spiritualitéet la loi de l'attraction, j'adore ça.

translation.en: So…
-Let's enjoy our drinks. -[Solomon] Mm-hmm.
It's really good.
So have you tried online dating?
translation.fr: Tu as essayé les sites de rencontre ?

translation.en: Well, I did, but I was just a little too nervous.
I kind of… It kind of creeped me out.
-Yeah. -No, no, no, no, no.
Bad idea. Bad idea.
With me, online dating didn't go too well. -Yeah. -'Cause I feel like I just get judged.
translation.fr: Pour moi, ça ne s'est pas bien passé.J'ai l'impression d'être jugé.

translation.en: You gotta get to know the person for who they are.
translation.fr: Il faut apprendre à connaître la personne.

translation.en: You know, I told you I'm into spirituality and all that.
translation.fr: Je t'ai ditque j'étais fan de spiritualité.

translation.en: [Dani] Yes, you sure do. Tell me about that.
I love it.
It's like, literally, I listen to… You okay?
translation.fr: En fait, c'est comme si j'écoutais…Ça va ?

translation.en: I am in love with you.
Huh?
I think you are so hot.
-[Cian] What's up, Solomon? -I wanna take a little break.
translation.fr: - Oui ?- Je veux faire une pause.

translation.en: -[Cian] Yeah, sure. -I'm sorry.
[Cian] If you need to take a break, take a break.
translation.fr: Si tu veux faire une pause, vas-y.

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -It's okay. [chuckles]
Okay, maybe the situation's a little awkward.
translation.fr: La situation est peut-être un peu gênante.

translation.en: I think I might have frightened him off.
translation.fr: Je crois que je l'ai effrayé.
